deploy.startCommand: /bin/sh -c "set -e; MODE=${RAILWAY_RUNTIME_MODE:-web}; export SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI=${SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI:-${DATABASE_URL:-}}; if [ -z \"$SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI\" ]; then echo 'ERROR: set SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI or DATABASE_URL'; exit 1; fi; if [ \"$MODE\" = \"worker\" ]; then echo 'Runtime mode: worker'; exec python -m app.worker_daemon; else echo 'Runtime mode: web'; if [ \"${RUN_MIGRATIONS_ON_STARTUP:-0}\" = \"1\" ]; then echo 'Running migrations...'; alembic upgrade head; fi; exec python -m uvicorn app.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port ${PORT:-8000}; fi"
